settings.text: Customised Hair Oil
settings.desc:
Based on your scalp health and stage of hair loss we customise your scalp oil.

• Maintains your scalp pH

• Stimulating your hair follicle

• Controls Dandruff

• Improves Hair Thickness

settings.text: Shampoo
settings.desc:
We customise your hair oil on the basis of your health condition, scalp condition, and dosha balance.

• Gets rid of dirt and oil

• Nourishes Hair Follicles

• Promotes Scalp Health

• Maintains Scalp PH

settings.text: Minoxidil
settings.desc:
On evaluating your hair condition, if hair thinning and hair loss are detected, this hair growth serum is prescribed for strengthening the hair and boosting hair growth.

• Promotes regrowth

• Helps manage hair loss

• Maintains scalp health

• Improves thickness

settings.text: Health Tatva
settings.desc:
In order to absorb nutrients better, your digestive system needs to be balanced and strong. This herb mix will improve and regulate metabolic activity and promote digestive health.

• Enhances digestive mechanism

• Helps your body absorb nutrients better

• Detoxifies toxins and balances pitta dosha

settings.text: Hair Ras
settings.desc:
Due to an imbalance in your Pitta Dosha, your hair gets affected and eventually leads to hair fall. This herb mix will work on balancing pitta and rejuvenating hair quality.

• Improves Blood Circulation

• Balances Pitta in the body

• Improves Hair Quality

• Delays greying

settings.text: Gutt Shuddhi
settings.desc:
According to your gut health, this herb mix will help you in regulating the bowel movements

• Relieves the body of constipation

• Brings digestion in the natural order

• Detoxifies your gut

settings.text: Ghrit
settings.desc:
According to Ayurveda the best route to treat any ailment is one closest to the affected part of the body. It is made from Pure Cow’s Ghee and Yashtimadhu.

This time tested herb is packed with health benefits, here are a few - anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, anti-bacterial, antiseptic, decongestant and expectorant.

settings.text: Hair Vitamin
settings.desc:
Based on your body’s nutritional needs and mineral requirements, this hair vitamin will help you strengthen your hair.

• Regulates blood flow to the scalp

• Addresses nutritional deficiencies that affect hair growth 

• Improves hair thickness

• Helps in boosting new hair growth cells

settings.text: Minoxidil 5%
settings.desc:
For regrowth of thicker and healthier looking hair in Male Pattern Hair loss

• Increases blood flow to hair follicles

• Prevents shrinking of hair roots due to DHT

• Increases the anagen (growth) phase of hair

• Boosts flow of oxygen and nutrient-rich blood to the scalp

settings.text: Scalp controller
settings.desc:
Instant relief from scalp itching and irritation caused by dandruff

• Soothes the scalp

• Normalizes excess sebum production

• Reduces the appearance of flaky dandruff

• Rehydrates and fights free radicals in the scalp

settings.text: Hair Root Serum
settings.desc:
A natural serum that reduces hair fall and promotes hair regrowth

• Reverses shrinking caused by DHT

• Prevents premature shrinking of hair follicles

• Gives visibly thicker hair growth

settings.name: Arjun, Thrissur, Kerala
settings.desc: I never paid attention on my hair and lost quite a lot of them. I think taking traya’s hair loss treatment is the best thing i have done to my hair. Not only did I see the new growth but the thickness and quality has also improved.

settings.name: Vivek, Mumbai
settings.desc: The results have been amazing! In just 2 months I’ve seen great improvements. My barber was also impressed.

settings.name: Darpan, Gujarat
settings.desc: I started to see regrowth from third month and even the patch on my scalp has started to cover. Best service and the best treatment!

settings.name: Hemant Shah
settings.desc: Great service. I loved the fact that you can talk to your hair coach in case of queries. They are truly supportive and help you stay commited on the journey. I never thought I could see new hair growth.

settings.name: Anupam Thakuria
settings.desc:
I took the hair assessment and realized that my hair loss was more than just genetic.

I went ahead with the recommended treatment plan and could see visible results within just 3 months.

settings.name: Pavan
settings.desc: I am super impressed with Traya's hair loss treatment. Let me start off by saying that all their products are formulated by doctors. Knowing that I have hair experts and doctors monitoring my treatment is really the best part of the experience. Really recommend this.

settings.name: Siddharth
settings.desc: I was losing a lot of hair due to the lockdown and desperate for a solution, that is when a friend recommended Traya. I gave it a shot and after 4 months of use, I can definitely say that their holistic approach to treating hair loss with both ayurveda and allopathy just works.

settings.name: Anonymous
settings.desc: Results in just 5 months, couldn't believe my eyes when I saw hair growth on my head. Anyone with hair problems should get on their plan. It works like magic.

settings.name: Akash Agarwal
settings.desc: I came to Traya with a bald patch and I did not expect any drastic results. My motive was to stop further hair loss, after dedicatedly following the plan and one can tell how it has changed my hair. I have baby hair all over my scalp and thicker growth. This is a dream, thank you guys you are the best!

settings.name: Shivyogi Hiremath
settings.desc: The treatment considered of proper diet, hair care products and supplements supporting your hair growth. I followed for 3-4 months and the results were amazing.

settings.paragraphs1: Follow a simple daily routine. Best results when used for 5 months.
